summary.Title: Do you want to earn DKK 170 an hour working weekends on Fanø Island? Can you clean rooms with a smile and do you want to make a difference for local communities? Then Sol og Strand has the perfect job for you!

JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Do you want to earn DKK 170 an hour working weekends on Fanø Island? Can you clean rooms with a smile and do you want to make a difference for local communities? Then Sol og Strand has the perfect job for you!
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
The rental of holiday homes is as Danish as bicycles, but we need people who can help to ensure that our holiday visitors enjoy an extraordinary holiday experience from the very beginning!

Our visitors’ holidays start from the moment they walk into a clean and inviting holiday home – and this is where you come into the picture as a service employee who cleans our holiday homes.

We offer:

  • DKK 170 an hour + 12.5% holiday pay, and mileage allowance in accordance with the Danish government’s mileage allowance rates.
  • You can listen to your favourite music/podcast/audio book or just chat with your favourite colleague while you earn money as you clean.
  • You also gain free access to our digital learning platform Sol og Strand Academy, gaining and honing skills in using for example, Excel, Word and PowerPoint.
  • A job where you are physically active and burn lots of calories while you earn money.

The successful candidate must have:

  • You have a smartphone, which allows you to download our quality assurance app, which you will use while working.
  • You are conscientious, attend work regularly and are methodical.
  • You want a job where you will work primarily at weekends, where Saturday is the busiest day – however chiefly in the time period 09:00 - 16:00, so that your evenings are still your own.

It is an advantage if you have a valid driving licence and use of a car – or you can clean with a colleague who has a valid driving licence and use of a car.

If you want to be Sol og Strand’s everyday hero, then contact us today. If you have any questions, then please contact the local office in person or by telephone.

#JobsforUkraine
